statements: SELECT id, address, price, sold FROM property;
SELECT address, price FROM property WHERE sold = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM property WHERE price > 100000;
SELECT address FROM property ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, address FROM property WHERE address LIKE '123%';
SELECT id, address, price, sold FROM property WHERE sold = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM property ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT address, price FROM property WHERE price > 100000 AND sold = FALSE ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT * FROM property WHERE sold = FALSE LIMIT 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_properties FROM property WHERE sold = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Properties
SELECT id, property_name, property_type FROM Properties WHERE price > 10000
SELECT property_name, price FROM Properties WHERE sold = TRUE ORDER BY property_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT property_type, count(*) as total_sales FROM Properties JOIN Sales ON Properties.id = Sales.property_id GROUP BY property_type
SELECT * FROM Properties WHERE price > 100000 ORDER BY property_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_name, property_type, price FROM Properties WHERE sold = true AND property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT property_name, property_type, price FROM Properties INNER JOIN Sales ON Properties.id = Sales.property_id WHERE sold = false AND sale_price > price ORDER BY sale_price DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_type, price, sale_price FROM Properties LEFT JOIN Sales ON Properties.id = Sales.property_id WHERE sale_price IS NULL;
SELECT property_name, property_type, price, sale_price FROM Properties JOIN Sales ON Properties.id = Sales.property_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Properties ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT property_name, address, price FROM Properties WHERE is_sold = TRUE;
SELECT id, sale_date, sale_price FROM Sales WHERE sale_price > 50000;
SELECT buyer_name, amount_paid FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT property_name, address, price, is_sold FROM Properties WHERE price < 100000;
SELECT * FROM Properties WHERE price > 100000 ORDER BY property_name DESC
SELECT property_name, address, price FROM Properties WHERE is_sold = TRUE ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT property_name, address, price FROM Properties WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%' AND is_sold = FALSE

SELECT p.property_name, s.sale_date, t.buyer_name, t.amount_paid FROM Properties p JOIN Sales s ON p.id = s.property_id JOIN Transactions t ON s.id = t.sale_id WHERE s.sale_price > 150000 ORDER BY s.sale_date ASC
SELECT property_name, address, price FROM Properties WHERE price BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000
SELECT * FROM Property;
SELECT property_id, address, price FROM Property WHERE sold = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Sale ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT buyer_id, name, email FROM Buyer WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT p.property_id, p.address, s.sale_date, py.amount FROM Property p INNER JOIN Sale s ON p.property_id = s.property_id INNER JOIN Payment py ON s.sale_id = py.sale_id WHERE py.amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Property;
SELECT address, price FROM Property WHERE sold = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Sale ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT Property.address, Sale.sale_date FROM Property INNER JOIN Sale ON Property.property_id = Sale.property_id WHERE Property.price > 10000;
SELECT Buyer.name, Payment.amount FROM Buyer INNER JOIN Payment ON Buyer.buyer_id = Payment.sale_id WHERE Payment.amount > 5000 ORDER BY Payment.payment_date;
SELECT * FROM Properties;
SELECT property_name, property_type FROM Properties WHERE property_status='available';
SELECT property_name, property_price FROM Properties ORDER BY property_price DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_price FROM Sales WHERE sale_price > 100000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT property_name, property_type, property_price FROM Properties WHERE property_status = 'available';
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_price > 100000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM Agents WHERE agent_name LIKE '%son%';
SELECT transaction_id, property_id, transaction_date FROM PropertyTransactions WHERE transaction_status = 'pending' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
